long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kiddo TV is an android mobile platform for your child to stream educational and entertaining videos on. As a parent or guardian, you can select which videos or channels from our pre- moderated video database to add to your child's device library. You may also select a limit for the duration of screen time you wish to make available for your child's device.

For videos that are not in our database, Kiddo TV extension allows you to add videos directly from YouTube to the device libraries, bypassing our moderation system.

For more information about Kiddo TV please visit www.kiddo.tv
